examples.example: 善良的老王总是热情地帮助周围的邻居。

translate.english: Kind Lao Wang always helps the surrounding neighbors enthusiastically.

examples.example: 勤劳的老王每天都把院子打扫得干干净净。

translate.english: Hardworking Lao Wang cleans the yard spotlessly every day.

examples.example: 乐观开朗的老王总能给身边的人带来欢声笑语。

translate.english: Optimistic and cheerful Lao Wang can always bring laughter and joy to the people around him.
